Here is the code for the case studies and supplemental material for the paper.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
data(sample_counts)
data(sample_labels)
data(sample_stats)

data(test_counts)
data(test_stats)
data(test_labels)
counts_nm = normalise_by_factor(sample_counts, colSums(sample_counts))
counts_test_nm = normalise_by_factor(test_counts, colSums(test_counts))

extract_features(sample_counts, sample_stats)

```
